name: Borgercastle Presents: VERTICALBLANKING in review
description:
Use the arrow keys to explore this non-copyright-infringing gallery.

Made for the finalé jam of the Babycastles gallery's  Pixels x Paper exhibition, of which my work was part (and I am very proud to have it displayed.) Thanks to everyone responsible for that exhibition, and to ebeth for pushing out the deadline just a little bit, because I started an hour late...

Made, of course, with Bitsy by Adam Le Doux.
